title: Pitcher, "White and light blue enamel bands with gold lining", ca. 1877

Pitcher, "White and light blue enamel bands with gold lining", ca. 1877.
ca. 1877. Glass, enamel,and gilding. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-162.
